entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Moosomin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.6°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
